field.name: first_segment_lang
field.label: Use language as first segment
field.description: This option only applies when the Language Filter system plugin is enabled.

field.name: segments
field.label: Segments
field.description:
Select the custom fields that will form the url.

Please take note that the first segment cannot be of type "Text".

field.name: menu_item_check
field.label: Menu item check
field.description:
Select if a route matches a menu item route, then if that route should be parsed by the plugin or not.

If you have a menu item that has the same alias as the first segment, then this should be disabled.
